mapper.select: select no, name, password, message, reg_date as regDate from guestbook order by no desc

choose.when: select no, name, password, message, reg_date as regDate from guestbook order by no desc limit 0, 3
choose.otherwise: select no, name, password, message, reg_date as regDate from guestbook where no < ${_parameter } order by no desc limit 0, 3

mapper.insert:
insert into guestbook values(null, #{name }, #{password }, #{message }, now())
select last_insert_id()
mapper.delete: delete from guestbook where no = #{no } and password = #{password }
